original_title: Joe Rogan: Talking Monkeys in Space
overview: 'Talking Monkeys in Space' captures Rogan breaking down cultural taboos; exploring his subjects with a raw honesty that is as engrossing as it is hilarious. Exuding a mad joy for life in all its insanity Rogan dispels the negative effects of marijuana use and marvels at his baby daughter; challenges the politically correct teachings of Dr. Phil and ends the anti-Evolution debate â€“ all with the incisive edge that has defined Rogan's comedy for over twenty years.
title: Joe Rogan: Talking Monkeys in Space
